revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = 2Wire_3600HGV |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = 2Wire |model = 3600 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = HGV |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/05/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/2Wire_3600HGV |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PGR2W3800HP |icid = 3439B-3800HGV |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = 2Wire;Ares;3001-000485-003 U; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- CPU1 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |cpu2chip1 = Ikanos;; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = <!-- CPU2 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;HY27US08561A-TPCB; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Eon;EN29LV160BB-70TIP; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4H511638G-LCCC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Lantiq;ADM6996M; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 28:16:2E,3C:EA:4F |oui = 28:16:2E,3C:EA:4F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = none
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.9 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.254 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = 2WIREXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/11/2008 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR2413A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Multiple labels printed with "727-008-048 (ARES)" are affixed to the board in the FCC photos. *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PGR2W3800HP PGR2W3800HP] covers both the 3600HGV and the 3800HGV-B. :CPU: [[2Wire]] ''TriMedia'' Perseus EC575543C-1L
Noted units.. *Assembly Number: 4200-001058-000 **3C:EA:4F OUI ('''2Wire''') **28:16:2E OUI ('''2Wire''') * The default SSID is, the same as all other known ''[[2Wire]]'' devices, :''2WIREXXX'' where ''XXX'' is the last three digits of the serial number.
The Flash shown in the FCC photos may be a K9F5608U0D-PCB0 (32MB).
==Links of Interest== *[http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/2011/09/12/the-2wire-family-of-tm32-cpus/ ''The family of TriMedia TM32 CPUs'' - Hacking the 2Wire] *[http://hackingbtbusinesshub.wordpress.com/category/perseus/ ''Discovering 2Wire card edge pinout (for JTAG/I2C)'' - Hacking the 2Wire]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
